abilities.title: Body Builder
abilities.description:
You're as strong as a good bodybuilder. You can do what a good bodybuilder can do.
Like lift and throw that big rock or tip over a cow.

abilities.title: Acrobat
abilities.description: You are very flexible and fast. You can do a backflip, jump between buildings, dodge attacks.

abilities.title: Tough
abilities.description: You are tough. You have unbendable will and can survive in difficult situations (without sleep, in toxic environment, etc).

abilities.title: Keen Ear
abilities.description: For the next 10 minutes you can hear things that are hard to hear.

abilities.title: Grapple
abilities.description: You grapple the opponent of your size or smaller. You can hold them for up to 5 minutes.

abilities.title: Keen Eye
abilities.description: For the next 10 minutes you can notice things that are hard to see.

abilities.title: Darkvision
abilities.description: For the next hour you can see in pitch darkness as if it’s an overcast day.

abilities.title: Eagle Eye
abilities.description: You gain superhuman vision for the next minute, you can see the tiniest objects extremely far away.

abilities.title: Owl's Ear
abilities.description: Gain hypersensitive hearing for the next minute. Hear things that are very far away, hear through walls.

abilities.title: Pack Mule
abilities.description: Increases the number of items you can carry by 5.

abilities.title: Run
abilities.description: For the next hour you can run as fast as a horse.

abilities.title: Leap
abilities.description: Jump up to 6 meters forward and 4 meters upward in any direction.

abilities.title: Hulk
abilities.description: You’re superhumanly strong, like Hulk or Mr. Incredible. You can rip that oak from the earth and snap it in half, you can punch through the solid wall.

abilities.title: Spider Man
abilities.description: You are capable of superhuman, spider-man-level acrobatics.

abilities.title: Peacemaker
abilities.description: Every time you find a non-combat resolution, you gain 2 EP.

abilities.title: Guardian
abilities.description: Every time you spare a life or rescue someone, you gain 3 EP.

abilities.title: Comedian
abilities.description: Every time you make a joke that gets a laugh from the group, you gain 2 EP.

abilities.title: Detective
abilities.description: Every time you solve a difficult puzzle, you gain 3EP.

abilities.title: Hero
abilities.description: When you put yourself at risk to protect someone, you gain 3 EP.

abilities.title: Celebrity
abilities.description: Every time you draw attention of a crowd, you gain 3 EP.

abilities.title: Fearless
abilities.description: When you do something your character fears the most, you gain 3 EP.

abilities.title: Insightful
abilities.description: You are very good at understanding people, reading social cues, figuring out their intentions.

abilities.title: Persuasive
abilities.description: You are very good at convincing people. You can talk your way out of the most difficult situations, you can convince the guard that you totally have an invitation to this party.

abilities.title: Liar
abilities.description: You are remarkably good at lying and pretending someone you're not.

abilities.title: Intimidating
abilities.description:
You can make a show of how dangerous you are, making everyone in the vicinity afraid of you.
Regular people and animals will run away or seek shelter, braver enemies may be able to overcome their fear, but will be more hesitant to mess with you.

abilities.title: Performance
abilities.description: You are good at putting on a show, pretending, playing a role.

abilities.title: Seduction
abilities.description: You've got good game.

abilities.title: Politics
abilities.description: You understand how to play the game of thrones. You have good insight into political alliances, motivations, plots.

abilities.title: Act like you belong
abilities.description: Invent a local saying and use it in your conversation with the NPC. It allows you to blend in and appear as a member of the social group NPC belongs to, gaining their trust.

abilities.title: Bartering
abilities.description: Convince people to trade and get better deals.

abilities.title: Folk Song
abilities.description: You sing a song that kindles strong feelings in the friendly/neutral NPCs nearby.(you need to sing a song at the table and describe your performance.) This will influence the mood of the crowd to the one of your choice (happy, somber, proud, indignant, etc.)

abilities.title: Aspiring Artist
abilities.description: You are pretty good at art of your choice(painting, music, theatre, etc)

abilities.title: Insight Expert
abilities.description: You are amazing at understanding people, reading social cues, figuring out their intentions.

abilities.title: Tell a Tale
abilities.description: Tell a local myth to the NPC, and explain what the lesson of it is ("Give refuge to strangers", "Help others", "Don't lie", "Forgive people", "Be a fair dealer", etc). NPC will likely comply with reasonable requests that are in line with the lesson.

abilities.title: Recruit
abilities.description: Recruit a low-level friendly NPC to help you for the next day.

abilities.title: Inspire
abilities.description:
Give an inspiring speech or tell a war story, and all your allies will gain 4 Energy Points.
(You actually need to tell the speech/story)

abilities.title: Deception Master
abilities.description: You are the world’s best liar. You can convince the Queen of England that you’re the King of England.

abilities.title: Persuasion Master
abilities.description: You are a master persuader. You can convince a grumpy pirate to let you hold onto his treasure map for a bit.

abilities.title: Horrifying
abilities.description: You can become embodiment of the person's worst nightmare, the deepest fear. Make yourself look very horrifying, breaking the wills of most people and creatures.

abilities.title: Sneaky
abilities.description: You are very good at sneaking and not being seen, especially at night.

abilities.title: Thief
abilities.description: You are very good at the art of stealing, concealing, smuggling things, especially when people are unaware or distracted.

abilities.title: Criminal Underworld
abilities.description: You have connections in the criminal underworld.

abilities.title: Lock Picking
abilities.description: Pick simple locks.

abilities.title: Subtle Spell
abilities.description: Use it to cast a spell in a way not detectable by the people around you.

abilities.title: Concealment
abilities.description: Unless you are actively searched, you can conceal up to 2 weapons or magic items on you.

abilities.title: Disguise
abilities.description: Craft a convincing disguise out of the clothes, make up, or objects you posess.

abilities.title: Forgery
abilities.description: Forge items, documents, or art.

abilities.title: Gather Intel
abilities.description: Infiltrate the person's office or home, and use your skills to reveal one of those things: The identity of an important associate, a location they will travel to (with the time and date), a secret that would embarrass them if revealed, their financial situation (including debts), their true feelings about you or your party, their strongest allegiance (to a government, guild, or other organization).

abilities.title: Ninja
abilities.description:
Your ability to sneak and hide is ninja-level, you're borderline invisible in the shadows.
You're borderline invisible. If the place can be snuk through, you'll sneak it.

abilities.title: Master Thief
abilities.description: You are an expert thief. You can steal, conceal, or smuggle anything.

abilities.title: Animal Handling
abilities.description: You are good at dealing with animals.

abilities.title: Tracking
abilities.description: You can follow tracks and identify what kind of creature has left them.

abilities.title: Build Shelter
abilities.description: When camping in the wilderness, use the nearby flora to build a shelter. It hides your presence from the hostile creatures, and gives you an early warning about their approach.

abilities.title: Disarm Traps
abilities.description: You can disarm traps.

abilities.title: Navigation
abilities.description: You can’t get lost in the wilderness. You can find your way to the closest oasis, shelter, nest of an animal.

abilities.title: Echolocation
abilities.description: When you are in a cave or a dungeon, make a loud sound, and you will sense the general shape of nearby passageways and locations.

abilities.title: Remedy
abilities.description: Scavenge a nearby area and find a plant-based remedy for an ailment. You find enough for a single dose. The remedy cures temporary illness and eliminates poison.

abilities.title: Distress Signal
abilities.description: Build a distress signal that can be seen by other Rangers. Within the next day, you will meet an NPC Ranger who comes to your aid.

abilities.title: Craftsman
abilities.description: Enables you to spend 3 XP to craft any common or uncommon item.

abilities.title: Potion Maker
abilities.description: Enables you to spend 2 XP to brew any common or uncommon potion.

abilities.title: Excellent Craftsman
abilities.description: Enables you to spend 6 XP to craft any rare item.

abilities.title: Experienced Potion Maker
abilities.description: Enables you to spend 6 XP to brew any rare potion.

abilities.title: Enchanter
abilities.description: Enables you to spend 1 XP to imbue a mundane item with a spell (one-time use).

abilities.title: Potion Master
abilities.description: Enables you to spend 9 XP to brew any legendary potion.

abilities.title: Enchantment Expert
abilities.description: Enables you to spend 9 XP to permanently imbue a mundane item with any spell.

abilities.title: Arcana Student
abilities.description: You know a lot about magic and arcane arts. You can identify magic items.

abilities.title: Technology
abilities.description: You understand technology. Enables you to use items that require technical skills.

abilities.title: Investigation
abilities.description: Describe how and where you search, and find subtle clues about what happened at the scene (if they exist).

abilities.title: Warfare
abilities.description: You understand the theoretical fundamentals of combat and warfare.

abilities.title: Medicine
abilities.description: You understand medicine, know how to treat wounds and diseases.

abilities.title: World
abilities.description: Recall facts about the world and its history.

abilities.title: Religion
abilities.description: You understand religions and gods of the world.

abilities.title: Arcana Master
abilities.description:
You have mastered the depth and intricacies of arcane arts.
You can identify and use any magic item.

abilities.title: Reckless Attack
abilities.description: Attack without concern for your life - deals double damage but makes you vulnerable to a counterattack.

abilities.title: Parry
abilities.description: Deflect melee attack from an equally skilled opponent.

abilities.title: Provoke
abilities.description: Will attract the attention of your target. The enemy will attack you until the battle ends or they take damage from someone else.

abilities.title: Intercept
abilities.description: Allows you to interrupt an enemy attack on your ally. They immediately end their turn, dealing no damage.

abilities.title: Knock Down
abilities.description: You charge in a straight line towards the selected enemy and smash into them. The enemy gets knocked down, losing their next turn.

abilities.title: Martial Artist
abilities.description: Your kicks and punches deal 4 damage.

abilities.title: Thrown Weapons
abilities.description: Thrown projectiles (rocks, darts, daggers) are much more likely to hit.

abilities.title: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: Allows you to deal double damage to the distracted enemy.

abilities.title: Retreat
abilities.description: You Provoke all nearby enemies to give your allies cover to retreat. Enemy fire will be concentrated on you.

abilities.title: Cripple
abilities.description: Attack a target within range, rendering them unable to move.

abilities.title: Charge
abilities.description: You charge in a straight line towards the selected enemy and smash into them. The enemy, everyone on your path, and everyone within reach gets knocked down, losing their next turn.

abilities.title: Dual Wielding
abilities.description: Allows you to make 2 attacks as 1 action. You must have two one-handed weapons in your inventory.

abilities.title: Whirldwind
abilities.description: Allows you to make a melee attack to everyone within reach.

abilities.title: Parry Master
abilities.description: Deflect physical ranged attacks (arrows, throwing daggers).

abilities.title: Thrown Weapons Expert
abilities.description: You can throw two weapons at once (at different targets, or the same one for double damage).

abilities.title: Master of Martial Arts
abilities.description: Your kicks and punches deal 12 damage. You're basically Jackie Chan on modafinil.

abilities.title: Light Armor
abilities.description: Light Armor adds twice the amount of HP written on the card.

abilities.title: Medium Armor
abilities.description: Medium Armor adds twice the amount of HP written on the card.

abilities.title: Heavy armor
abilities.description: Heavy Armor adds twice the amount of HP written on the card.

abilities.title: Farshot
abilities.description: Enables you to shoot at a target out of your range.

abilities.title: Barrage
abilities.description: Allows you to shoot 3 arrows at once (at the same target).

abilities.title: Deadeye
abilities.description: Allows you to target any coin-size object.

abilities.title: Ricochet
abilities.description: Allows you to shoot arrow such that it ricochets between 5 targets.

abilities.title: [Custom Title]
abilities.description: [Create and edit this card if you need to create a custom one]

spells.title: Small Fireball
spells.description: Sets stuff on fire. Hold in your hand as a light source.

spells.title: Fire hose
spells.description: For the next minute, a stream of water shoots from your hand like from a fire hose.

spells.title: Annoying Cloud
spells.description: Summon a cloud that will float above the target's head, rain on them, distracting them and impairing their vision for the next hour.

spells.title: Shockwave
spells.description: Thunderous shockwave in the direction you are facing. The wave knocks up to three creatures backward and hits them each for 3 damage.

spells.title: Electricute
spells.description: A bolt of lightning strikes it from the sky or from your hands, dealing damage and melting metallic objects.

spells.title: Mold Earth
spells.description: You can target an area (5x5 meter cube) of loose earth, you can instantaneously excavate it, move it along the ground, and deposit it up to 5 meters away. You can cause shapes, colors, or both to appear on the dirt or stone, spelling out words, creating images, or shaping patterns.

spells.title: Stun
spells.description: Stun the target creature for 1 minute. It's unable to move or do anything.

spells.title: Freeze Pulse
spells.description: Freezes liquids, covers objects with ice, creates ice on the ground (can do what Frozone from Incredibles can do).

spells.title: Big Fireball
spells.description: Creates a big explosion

spells.title: Heal
spells.description: Heal the target person/creature (can use on yourself). Restores 4 HP.

spells.title: Blood Sacrifice
spells.description: Sacrifice 5 points of your health to recover 4 energy points.

spells.title: Mana Transfer
spells.description: Drains 3 points of your energy, giving 2 points of energy to another person/creature.

spells.title: Shield
spells.description: Create a force field around a target creature or an object. Resists up to 8 damage.  Always has clean air inside. Lasts for an hour, or until it takes more than 8 damage.

spells.title: Trigger
spells.description: Pick one of the spells you know that will activate when a certain condition is met. Whenever that happens within the designated area(15-meter-radius) the spell will be cast.

spells.title: Recharge
spells.description: Sacrifice 3 points of your health to grant 2 energy points to the target person/creature (can use on yourself).

spells.title: Plane of Force
spells.description: Create 10x10 meters invisible wall of force(at any angle). Lasts for 30 minutes or until it takes 10 damage. Can support up to 500kg of weight.

spells.title: Sight ward
spells.description: Nobody can see what’s going on inside a sphere of 15 meter radius

spells.title: Bestow Spell
spells.description: Give the target an ability to use one of the spells you know once.

spells.title: Evil Ward
spells.description: No evil can cross the circle of 15 meter radius. Lasts for 1 hour.

spells.title: Anti-magic ward
spells.description: Magic doesn’t work within a sphere of 15 meter radius

spells.title: Velocity ward
spells.description: Nothing can move faster than a falling feather within a sphere of 15 meter radius

spells.title: Minor Telekinesis
spells.description: Slowly levitate small objects.

spells.title: Push/Pull metal
spells.description: Push metal directly away from you, or pull it towards you. If the object is lighter than you, the object moves, if it’s heavier - you move. If an object is thrown at a speed, deals 4 damage.

spells.title: Force field
spells.description: Stationary transparent physical barrier, sphere of 15 meter radius. Anything can get out, nothing can go in.

spells.title: Walk on walls/ceiling
spells.description: For the next 20 minutes you can walk on any surface at any angle as if it was regular floor.

spells.title: Levitate
spells.description: Slowly lifts the target (object, creature, including yourself) vertically above the ground, up to 10 meters. The target can weight up to 300 kg.

spells.title: Greater Telekinesis
spells.description: Levitate human-sized objects and creatures (not including yourself). Throwing an object/creature deals 5 damage to the target and to the object.

spells.title: Fly
spells.description: Grant the power of flight to the target creature(including yourself). The target can fly at a speed of a bird for the next 10 minutes.

spells.title: Minor Illusion
spells.description: Create an illusion of an object (no larger than a barrel) or a sound within 50 meters and your line of sight.

spells.title: Darkness
spells.description: Create a field of magical darkness 10 meters in diameter.

spells.title: Veil
spells.description: Create a static illusion no larger than 100 meters in any direction. Like a building, an oasis, a pile of treasure, etc. When a creature touches the illusion they can no longer see it.

spells.title: Invisibility
spells.description: Turn yourself, a willing creature, or an object (no larger than a horse) invisible for the next 20 minutes. When they take damage they reappear.

spells.title: Embody fear
spells.description: The target person/creature see the image of whatever they fear the most.

spells.title: Major Illusion
spells.description: Create an object no larger than an elephant, complete with sounds, smells, movement.

spells.title: Illusory Automaton
spells.description: Create an illusory person or a creature that can perform simple tasks you give it. It has 5 hit points, lives for a day, and can travel any distance away from you. When it's nearby, you can control it telepathically.

spells.title: Message
spells.description: Telepathically send a message to the nearby creature, they can respond back.

spells.title: Inquire
spells.description: You learn the creature's Ideal, Flaw, and Desire. You can also learn the worst or best thing they have ever done.

spells.title: Translate
spells.description: Understand the language of the person you're speaking to.

spells.title: Share Dreams
spells.description: Fall asleep and enter the dream of a sleeping creature within 50 meters around you.

spells.title: Mind Sense
spells.description: Sense minds in 30 meter radius around you. Get some basic information about each mind – how complex their thoughts are, their species, their gender, their mood.

spells.title: Mind Melt
spells.description: Create telepathic connection with a willing creature. Both of you will see/hear through the other one's senses, and read each other's surface thoughts.

spells.title: Intent
spells.description: You look into the mind of the creature, learning about their most prominent short-term goal (what they want to accomplish within the next 10 minutes), long term goal, or what their intentions are towards a specific creature or an object.

spells.title: Technomancy
spells.description: Ability to control electrical/mechanical devices from a distance. Activate/deactivate them, make them perform their functions.

spells.title: Read Surface Thoughts
spells.description: For the next 10 minutes you can hear and understand what a target creature within 50 meters is thinking.

spells.title: Read Memories
spells.description: Search through unconscious creature's mind, pulling out 15 minutes of memories.

spells.title: Lie Detector
spells.description: For the next 10 minutes you know when you hear lying.

spells.title: Mind Stealer
spells.description: Eat a person’s brain, and for the next hour you have access to their skills and memories.

spells.title: Charm Person
spells.description: The person regards you as their friend for 1 hour. When the spell ends, they know they’ve been charmed.

spells.title: Influence
spells.description: Speak to the person and influence their state of mind for the next hour. Choose one of the psychological effects (increased confidence, anxiety, euphoria, fear, paranoia, calm, irritability, etc).

spells.title: Suggestion
spells.description: Influence target's thoughts and behaviors. Making them trust someone they otherwise wouldn't, look away, feel an emotion they would not normally be inclined to feel, calm or intensify what they feel.

spells.title: Sleep
spells.description: Sing the lullaby, causing the target creatures within 30 meters around you to fall asleep. (you actually need to come up with and sing a lullaby).

spells.title: No Secrets
spells.description: Find out if an ally is keeping an important secret from you. You’ll learn who they are but not what the secret is.

spells.title: Redirect Feelings
spells.description: When an NPCs has some strong feelings toward you (love, anger, etc), you can redirect that feeling to a different target for a day.

spells.title: Command
spells.description: Speak a simple two-word command  (Approach me, Drop item, Flee, Fall down, Halt, etc) to a creature you can see within 50 meters, and it will be forced to obey.

spells.title: Calm/Intensify Emotions
spells.description: Reduce or amplify the emotion the target is feeling.

spells.title: Captivate
spells.description: Conjure a dazzling image in the air (describe the image), captivating anyone who looks at it. Image hangs in the air for 10 minutes then dissipates.

spells.title: Remoralization
spells.description: Until the end of the day, the NPC shapes their behavior around their ideal

spells.title: Alter Senses
spells.description: Change the way the target will experience the world for the next day. Cause them to perceive a specific thing or a category of things falsely (make them see all wolves as puppies, the king as a clown, see all the doors shifted 5 paces away from where they actually are, have them think that freshly baked bread smells like fire. etc). The spell lasts until you cancel it or until the creature is harmed by the effects of the deception.

spells.title: Puppeteering
spells.description: Compel the target to physically take an action that lasts no longer than 5 seconds  - jump, kick, throw something, release an arrow, etc.

spells.title: Compel Truth
spells.description: The target is compelled to answer all questions truthfully for the next 5 minutes.

spells.title: Mind wiping
spells.description: Touch an unconscious person/creature, and erase any 15 minutes of their memory, or all their recent memories up to 1 month ago.

spells.title: Alter Memory
spells.description: Change any 15 minutes of the character’s memory.

spells.title: Value Change
spells.description: You reach deep into the person’s soul, and change what they value the most in life. Lasts for 1 hour. After it’s dispelled, the person knows you’ve done it to them. Highly illegal, punishable by death in all civilized societies. Possess a creature. You control a possessed creature, can read it’s mind and use it’s skills.

spells.title: Dominate
spells.description: You gain full control over the person for an hour. You can issue commands, or take control over their mind directly - see through their senses and control their body, but during that time you lose awareness of your own body and what's going on around you. The spell lasts 1 hour, spend 2 energy per hour to extend the duration.

spells.title: Query
spells.description: Pick an object, learn about 3 important events in its history.

spells.title: Sense Magic
spells.description: You can sense the magic auras of any spells, items, or creatures within 200 meters around you. You'll get a vague sense of what they are, and their general direction. Allows you to detect illusions.

spells.title: Evil Eye
spells.description: You pause, closing your eyes and quieting your mind. You sense the worst thing that  happened nearby within the last day.

spells.title: Sense Danger
spells.description: Activate your 'spidey sense', for the next 30 minutes you'll be able to sense imminent danger.

spells.title: Infrasight
spells.description: Sense heat emanating from creatures. You can sense it through walls.

spells.title: Probability Lanes
spells.description: You see the most likely short-term outcomes of the action you're about to take.

spells.title: Nemesis
spells.description: Mark a creature you can see as your nemesis(you can have only one at a time). Now you will always sense when the nemesis is nearby, and the direction they’re in (even if they’re invisible).

spells.title: Find Nemesis
spells.description: You see the vision of a place your nemesis has visited in the past day.

spells.title: X-Ray Vision
spells.description: See through solid objects in 30 meter radius for the next 5 minutes.

spells.title: Seek
spells.description: You glimpse the target in real time, can see its surroundings, and may watch it for the next minute.

spells.title: Astral Projection
spells.description: Create an astral body (like a ghost), it's transparent, glows faint blue light, it's invulnerable to damage and can pass through walls. It lasts an hour, spend 2EP to extend the duration by an hour.

spells.title: Oracle
spells.description: Get a correct yes or no answer to any question that can be answered.

spells.title: Familiar Transposition.
spells.description: Swap places with your familiar.

spells.title: Summon Item
spells.description: Mark an object or an item (no larger than 2x2 meters). Whenever you cast this spell, it will teleport to your hand (or in front of you) from wherever it is.

spells.title: Rewind
spells.description: Teleport where you physically were 5 minutes ago(doesn’t take you back in time)

spells.title: Misty Step
spells.description: Instantly telepot a short-distance (a stone's throw, line of sight. Think Nightcrawler from X-Men).

spells.title: Portal
spells.description: Open 2 connected portals (within 50 meter radius, line of sight, like in Portal game). Portals have custom radius (up to 2 meters), stay open for up to 5 minutes (spend 1 EP per minute to extend the duration), and can transport up to 10 elephants worth of mass.

spells.title: Greater Teleportation
spells.description: Teleport any object, willing or unwilling creature, within 100 meters to another point within 100 meters.

spells.title: Mend
spells.description: Fix a broken non-magical item (broken cup, torn clothes).

spells.title: Conjure a Mundane Item
spells.description: Create a small non-magical item you’re familiar with (like a hammer, a spyglass, or a candle). No larger than 3 feet cube, no heavier than 10 pounds. The object is visibly magical, disappears after 1 hour, or if it takes or deals any damage.

spells.title: Create a wall
spells.description: Creates a stone wall, 10x10 meters. Window is optional.

spells.title: Summon Familiar
spells.description: Summon a small creature who will be your pet and a friend. You can communicate with it telepathically, give it commands, see through its eyes, hear what it hears, cast spells through it. If the creature takes damage it disappears, but you can resummon it.

spells.title: Transfiguration
spells.description: Turn an object into any other object of the same size made out of the same material.

spells.title: Summon a creature
spells.description: Summon a non-magical animal no larger than a cow. It obeys your commands. Disappears within an hour.

spells.title: Summon a swarm
spells.description: Summon a swarm of insects that obeys your telepathic orders.

spells.title: Summon an Evil Twin
spells.description: Create a copy of a target person/creature that has the opposite values and will do it's best to achieve the outcome opposite from what they want.

spells.title: Split
spells.description: Splits you into two identical clones. Each clone has 50% of your energy points. Sustaining a clone takes 2 EP per hour. The clones can fight and use magic (including splitting into more clones). When a clone takes any damage or runs out of energy points, it disappears, it's memories instantly merged into the remaining clones. When there's only one remains - it becomes the "original" you, keeping the memories of all the copies.

spells.title: Grow gills
spells.description: Touch a willing creature, and they grow gills allowing them to breathe underwater for up to 1 hour.

spells.title: Petrify
spells.description: Turns a non-magical creature or an object (no larger than a barrel) you’re touching into stone for the next 5 minutes.

spells.title: Elasticity
spells.description: For the next 10 minutes you can do what Elastigirl from Incredibles can do.

spells.title: Turn into Creature
spells.description: Touch a willing non-magical creature and spend an Experience point to “acquire” it. Now you can turn into this creature for up to an hour.

spells.title: Turn into Person
spells.description: Touch a willing person and spend an Experience point to “acquire” them. Now you can turn into this person for up to an hour.

spells.title: Shapeshift Target
spells.description: Touch a willing or unconscious creature or a person, turning them into a creature/person you have acquired.

spells.title: Turn into a Magical Creature
spells.description: Works like Turn into Creature, but works on magical creatures.

spells.title: Speak with Animals
spells.description: For the next hour you can speak with animals.

spells.title: Animal Courier
spells.description: You can ask a nearby animal to deliver a small item. The destination must be within 3 day’s travel time.

spells.title: Fog
spells.description: Produce fog between your hands, it's quickly covering the nearby area, making everyone unable to see beyond their reach.

spells.title: Animal Buddy
spells.description: Recruit a nearby animal, they will follow your orders to the best of their ability. It can't be smaller than a mouse or bigger than a horse. You can have only one animal partner at a time. If you get separated, it will try to find you. They have 6 HP and can make basic attacks for 2 damage.

spells.title: Intwine
spells.description: Use grass, wines, and tree branches as if they were your own limbs.

spells.title: Speak with Trees
spells.description: Touch a tree trunk, connecting yourself to the nearby forest. It can help you find a creature or an object located in the forest, a path to a location, or warn you about the nearby danger.

spells.title: Change weather
spells.description: Summon a storm, a fog, a heatwave, calm the weather, etc. You can’t cause lightning or natural-disaster level events(tornado, tsunami, etc).

spells.title: Bond
spells.description: You develop a telepathic connection with an animal. You can see/hear through their senses. You can enter a trance to leave your body and take control of your partner. You remain dimly aware of what's happening around your own body.

spells.title: Change Season
spells.description: You change the season in the area of 1km around you for the next day.

spells.title: Control Bugs
spells.description: You can sense and control all the insects within 100 meter radius for the next 2 hours.

spells.title: Beastmaster
spells.description: Gather an army of up to 50 nearby animals who will follow your commands.

spells.title: Natural Disaster
spells.description: Summon a natural disaster like tornado, hurricane, tsunami, etc.

spells.title: Bestow Sentience
spells.description: Touch a non-sentient creature, and bestow the gift of sentience and intelligence onto it.

spells.title: Fake Death
spells.description: Appear to be dead for the next 30 minutes.

spells.title: Sense Death
spells.description: Sense whether any remnants of the dead are nearby, their location, and the nature of their death (natural causes, accident, or a faul play).

spells.title: Steal Life
spells.description: Steal one person's/creature's life force and give it to another. Aging the source and making the target proportionally younger. Transfers 8 HP.

spells.title: Last Moments
spells.description: Touch a dead person/creature, and see what they have seen during the last 5 seconds of their life.

spells.title: Speak to the Dead
spells.description: Touch a dead person/creature to summon their ghost. You can talk/communicate with it for the next 10 minutes.

spells.title: Raise a zombie
spells.description:
Turns a dead body into a zombie. It obeys your commands and can attack enemies.
Raise undead. The raised person has their memories and is able to speak.

spells.title: Vampirism
spells.description: Recover up to 5 HP or EP by drinking the blood of a sentient creature you've just killed. If you have this perk, you can't walk into houses uninvited, and you lose 1 HP for every hour you are under direct sunlight.

spells.title: Ticking Bomb
spells.description: Curse the person's/creature's heart, causing it to explode instantly, or at any point within the next year.

spells.title: Posess
spells.description: Touch any dead creature, and make it the host of the nearby ghost. The ghost can now use it's body, and remember fragments of their memories.

spells.title: Reverse Gravity
spells.description: Reverse gravity inside 10x10 meter cube.

spells.title: Luck
spells.description: Cast this spell when someone performs an action, and it will be influenced by the supernaturally good (or bad) luck.

spells.title: Intangibility
spells.description: Become immaterial (like a ghost) for the next 10 minutes. Walk through doors, let attacks pass through you.

spells.title: Slow Time
spells.description: Makes time run 10x slower. 5x5 meter cube

spells.title: Still Magic
spells.description: Stop time for a selected object for 1 minute.

spells.title: Speed
spells.description: For the next 2 seconds the time flows 100 times slower for you, so it feels to you like 3 minutes (Quicksilver powers).

spells.title: Revision Magic
spells.description: Pick an object, creature, or 3x3 meter area, and rewind it's time for up to 1 minute. Revising a person causes them to lose all their memories of what happened during revision time, and all the damage they took.

magicItems.title: Ropey
magicItems.description:
A sentient piece of rope. 50ft. 
As smart as a puppy. Obeys simple commands (coil, uncoil, tie a knot, crawl).

magicItems.title: Immovable rod
magicItems.description:
Activating it makes it magically fixed in place. 
Until someone deactivates it, the rod doesn't move, even if it is defying gravity.

magicItems.title: Snarky Multitool
magicItems.description: A hammer possessed by a shapeshifting ghost. Can change itself into any small object or tool, if you can convince it to. Warning - it has a difficult personality.

magicItems.title: Imitator Goo
magicItems.description: Activate it, and it permanently turns into any mundane object it touches.

magicItems.title: Pedant's Pendant
magicItems.description: Gives you eidetic memory - perfect recollection of everything you have seen or experienced while wearing it(spend 3 EP to recall a memory).

magicItems.title: Holocrystal
magicItems.description: Records 3D holographic images and videos of the things in 10 meter radius around it (can also take regular photos/videos). Can send these recordings to other crystals.

magicItems.title: Mokeskin Pouch
magicItems.description: A small pouch that contains 4x4 meters of extradimensional space where you can store items, liquids, or even living creatures. Increases the number of items you can carry by 5. Any creature inside the pouch can exit it at will.

magicItems.title: Magic Tent
magicItems.description: Like in Harry Potter, from the inside it's a small comfy apartment.

magicItems.title: Refilling Flask
magicItems.description: Refills itself every midnight with whatever liquid was last in it. Works with potions.

magicItems.title: Alvion's Bracelet
magicItems.description: With a twist of a ruby set in a bracelet, it allows an instant change of clothes, where ‘clothes' is fairly permissively defined and can include both weapons, armor, and things carried up to two hundred pounds, barring people. Can store up  to 3 outfits.

magicItems.title: Ring of Upward Bliss
magicItems.description: Tapping the ring three times teleports the user a mile up into the air.

magicItems.title: Clay Golem
magicItems.description: Slow and stupid servant, capable of obeying simple commands. Has 10 HP and can deal 4 damage.

magicItems.title: Small Energy Crystal
magicItems.description: Automatically accumulates energy, stores up to 4 Energy Points, recharges once per day. Use it once per day to recover 4EP.

magicItems.title: Large Energy Crystal
magicItems.description: Automatically accumulates energy, stores up to 8 Energy Points, recharges once per day. Use it once per day to recover 8EP.

magicItems.title: Ultimate Lockpick
magicItems.description: When you insert it into any lock, it morphs into the key that fits.

magicItems.title: Crystal of Luck Storage
magicItems.description: Intentionally roll with disadvantage, "storing" the luck, which you can later use to roll with advantage.

magicItems.title: Magic sword
magicItems.description: Grows brighter when the enemies are nearby. Deals 5 damage.

magicItems.title: Staff of Druid
magicItems.description: Deals 4 damage. Strike earth, and a fountain of water will shoot up from that location for the next 10 minutes.

magicItems.title: Vambrace of Octopus
magicItems.description: Shoots out up to 8 thin, 10 meters long tentacles. Tentacles can grapple things and creatures, or deal 5 damage. Tentacles are strong enough to grasp a ledge of a building, and support your weight hanging on them.

magicItems.title: Needler
magicItems.description: A throwing dagger that returns back into your hand once it hits or misses the target. Stays hidden when the wielder is searched.

magicItems.title: Polysword
magicItems.description: Turns into any basic melee weapon.

magicItems.title: Flickerblade
magicItems.description: A sword with a blade that can blink in and out of existence with a thought. When the blade materializes, any material in its way is instantly removed from existence. Deals 4 damage.

magicItems.title: Flaming Whip
magicItems.description: An epic whip made out of pure fire, energy, and rage. The one Indiana Jones would have, if he was a demon.

magicItems.title: Sending Stones
magicItems.description: Magical walkie-talkie. Communicate telepathically within 300 meters of each other.

magicItems.title: Daily Cypress Pocket Edition
magicItems.description: This pendant can be activated once per day, it reads you the most recent news headlines.

magicItems.title: Emerald bug
magicItems.description: Activate it, and for the next 5 days you will always know it’s location, and be able to hear what’s going on around it.

magicItems.title: Cloak of Disguise
magicItems.description: Creates an illusion around you, allowing you to assume the appearance

magicItems.title: Babelfish
magicItems.description: Put this tiny fish into your ear, and it'll translate any language you hear.

magicItems.title: Babellense
magicItems.description: Translate any text you see through it into the language you understand.

magicItems.title: Darkvision goggles
magicItems.description: See in the darkness as if it was daylight.

magicItems.title: Infrared goggles
magicItems.description: Add infrared vision that lets you see an outline of things that are generating heat nearby. Work through walls.

magicItems.title: Silver Fly
magicItems.description: Send it anywhere within 30 meters from you, see and hear through it's senses.

magicItems.title: Recording Gem
magicItems.description: Activate it, and it will record sounds/video around it for the next hour.

magicItems.title: Ring of Sending
magicItems.description: Send a telepathic 25-word message to anyone you have ever met.The recipient can send you a 25-word reply. Works twice per day.

magicItems.title: Meeseeks Box
magicItems.description: Press a button, name a simple task, it will create a helpful servant. The Meeseek lives until he accomplishes the simple task (up to an hour). If the task proves to be too difficult, he may turn on you out of frustration.

magicItems.title: Marauder's Map
magicItems.description: Reveals the floor plan of the building you're in, with labeled moving dots of the creatures inside.

magicItems.title: Micro Time-Turner
magicItems.description: Activating this small hourglass sends you 1 minute back in time. Can be used up to 5 times per day.

magicItems.title: Invisibility Cloak
magicItems.description: Turns the wearer invisible.

magicItems.title: Helm of Illusion
magicItems.description: Place this helm onto a person's head, and it will create a virtual world of your design, indistinguishable from reality.

magicItems.title: Stopwatch of Timelessness
magicItems.description: Select up to 12 targets (people, creatures, objects). The time will pause for everything but them for up to 12 hours.

magicItems.title: Eye of Vance
magicItems.description: Sees everything in 360 degrees and 100m radius around you. Can see through solid objects. Can see invisible objects. Can see anything hidden. Works twice per day for 10 minutes

magicItems.title: Unlabeled package
magicItems.description: Mysterious package. When you unwrap it, you can declare what was contained inside. It can be anything, as long as it's no more valuable than a horse or a good sword. If you name something too valuable/powerful, the box returns the closest thing that fits into the value range (if you ask for a potion of immortality, it might return a health potion or a spell scroll).

magicItems.title: Teleportation pyramids
magicItems.description: 2 small pyramids. Activating one pyramid teleports anyone who touches it to the location of the other pyramid.

magicItems.title: Teleportation Key
magicItems.description: Teleports you and up to 5 people who are touching it to any location you have ever personally visited. 1 hour cooldown.

magicItems.title: Dimensional Gate
magicItems.description: A pair of portals (large obsidian circles) connected by a wormhole.

magicItems.title: The ring of tiny-beast master
magicItems.description: Allows you to sense and control all the insects within 100 meter radius around you.

magicItems.title: Ring of Spell Storing
magicItems.description: Cast a spell on the ring to store it. Anyone who wears the ring can now cast this spell once. Stores up to 3 spells.

magicItems.title: Imperius Collar
magicItems.description: When it's put onto a person or a creature, you gain the ability to mind-control them. The person can break free when the collar is removed, or when it runs out of energy (touch the collar to charge it with Energy Points, 5 per day of use.) The person will obey your commands, but do their best to break free. You can take over their mind directly - see through their senses and control their body, but during that time you lose awareness of your own body and what's going on around you.

magicItems.title: Time Chamber
magicItems.description: Inside this room, the time moves 30 times faster. Spending a month in this room means only a day will pass outside.

magicItems.title: Backpack of Earthly Delights
magicItems.description: Backpack that allows the retrieval of mundane non-technical items from Earth with a thought, once per day. The item must fit within the backpack. Only items which actually exist on Earth can be requested. Game Master can always deny a request, in that case the backpack will contain the non-game-breaking item most similar to the request (if you ask for a bazooka you might get a stick of dynamite).

magicItems.title: Rememberball
magicItems.description: Activate it to "Save Game". You can return to the saved state for the next 10 minutes. To "load game" more than once, spend extra 2 EP.

magicItems.title: Death Note
magicItems.description: If you know the person's name and face, write their name in this black notebook, describing the time (within the next month) and manner of death (something that could realistically happen to them), and they will die in a described manner. Works once per day.

magicItems.title: Small Health Potion
magicItems.description: Restores 4 health.

magicItems.title: Small Energy Potion
magicItems.description: Restores 4 energy.

magicItems.title: Large Health Potion
magicItems.description: Restores 8 health.

magicItems.title: Large Energy Potion
magicItems.description: Restores 8 energy.

magicItems.title: Potion of Spider Climbing
magicItems.description: Climb walls/ceilings like spider man for 30 minutes.

magicItems.title: Potion of Underwater Breathing
magicItems.description: Lasts for 2 hours.

magicItems.title: Sleeping Potion
magicItems.description: The one who drinks it instantly falls asleep for 1 hour.

magicItems.title: Chloroform
magicItems.description: The one who inhales it instantly falls asleep for 1 hour.

magicItems.title: Vial of Acid
magicItems.description: Burns through objects. Deals 4 damage.

magicItems.title: Poison
magicItems.description: The one who drinks it takes 15 damage.

magicItems.title: Magic Mushroom Potion
magicItems.description: Causes hallucinations

magicItems.title: Singing Potion
magicItems.description: For the next 30 minutes the drinker loses the ability to speak, able only to sing.

magicItems.title: Invisibility Potion
magicItems.description: Turns you invisible for 10 minutes

magicItems.title: Paralyzing Potion
magicItems.description: The one who drinks it is instantly paralyzed for the next day.

magicItems.title: Potion of Animal Friendship
magicItems.description: When you drink this potion, even the meanest non-magical animals will like you, and will be amenable to training.

magicItems.title: Potion of Growth
magicItems.description: The drinker grows to be 10 times larger for 20 minutes.

magicItems.title: Shrinking Potion
magicItems.description: The drinker shrinks to be 20 times smaller for 20 minutes.

magicItems.title: Smoke Potion
magicItems.description: Creates a huge cloud of black smoke when spilled.

magicItems.title: Tree Potion
magicItems.description: Instantly spawns a tree where it was spilled)

magicItems.title: Anti-Gravity Potion
magicItems.description: Drinker isn't affected by gravity for an hour.

magicItems.title: Truth Serum
magicItems.description: One who drinks it can’t tell lies for an hour

magicItems.title: Polyjuice Potion
magicItems.description: Drop someone’s hair into it, and drinking this potion will turn you into that person for 30 minutes.

magicItems.title: Falcon Potion
magicItems.description: Turns you into a falcon for 30 minutes

magicItems.title: Potion of Body Switching
magicItems.description: When two people drink this potion, it swaps their minds freaky-friday style.

magicItems.title: Forget me now Potion
magicItems.description: The one who drinks this potion will completelya lose the memories of everything that happened during the past 24 hours.

magicItems.title: Seduction Potion
magicItems.description: The drinker becomes irresistable to the opposite gender.

magicItems.title: The Ant-Man Potion
magicItems.description: You shrink down to the size of an ant, while retaining the strength of a human. Lasts for 1 hour.

magicItems.title: Love Potion
magicItems.description: Drop your hair into it. The person who drinks it will fall madly in love with you for 5 hours.

magicItems.title: Zombie Raising Potion
magicItems.description: Spill on a grave to raise a zombie.

magicItems.title: Vampire Potion
magicItems.description: Turns you into a vampire for a day. Your current spells and abilities are replaced with what vampire can do (see the Vampire NPC card for the list of powers). You also gain unquenchable thirs for blood (you must kill at least one sentient creature). Sunlight and garlic are deadly to you.

magicItems.title: Potion of Silent Death
magicItems.description: The one who drinks it experiences no symptoms, and then dies within one week, seemingly without a cause.

equipment.description: A shiny steal dagger. Looks ready for violence.

equipment.title: Crowbar
equipment.description: Smashes things, pries things open.

equipment.description: Regular sword. Deals 4 damage.

equipment.title: Obsidian Sword
equipment.description: A pitch black sword. Deals 6 damage, adds bonus dice to your attack rolls.

equipment.title: Light Bow

equipment.title: Light Crossbow
equipment.description: A small and light crossbow.

equipment.title: Staff
equipment.description: A wooden staff

equipment.title: Slingshot
equipment.description: Shoots a small projectile(like a pebble). Deals 3 damage.

equipment.title: Blunderbuss
equipment.description: Old-timey Gun. Takes a minute to reload.

equipment.title: Ninja Armor
equipment.description: Suit made out of light black clothes. Increases you max HP by 3 points. Makes you very hard to notice in the dark.

equipment.title: Steel Armor
equipment.description: Increases your max HP by 6 points.

equipment.title: Obsidian Armor

equipment.title: Grappling Hook Gun
equipment.description: Shoots the grappling hook to the distance of up to 50 meters, reels it back in.

equipment.title: Bear Trap
equipment.description: Perfect for setting traps (not just for bears).

equipment.title: Rope
equipment.description: Regular piece of 50ft rope.

equipment.title: 10 foot pole
equipment.description: A regular 10 foot pole. Useful whenever you need a 10 foot pole.

equipment.title: Torches
equipment.description: Provide light. Set things on fire.

equipment.title: Spyglass
equipment.description: Helps you see farther.

equipment.title: Waterskin
equipment.description: Holds liquids.

equipment.title: Ball Bearings
equipment.description: Great for setting traps for the enemies.

equipment.title: Shovel
equipment.description: You know, digging stuff.

equipment.title: Glider
equipment.description: Artificial wings you can use for gliding.

equipment.title: Bag of Gold
equipment.description: Can be used to live a lavish lifestyle for a month, or traded for something valuable.

equipment.title: A big Ruby
equipment.description: A big shiny gem. Trade it for something useful.
